QuestData.Title: If Bones Could Talk
QuestData.Description:
<These skeletons appear to be rising out of the ancient ruins that dot the land here. Their bones are covered with what looks like runes, but time has worn away all but fragments of the markings.
If you could find some of these runes intact, Lucille might be able to decipher them to find out where these skeletons come from...
...and why they are no longer at rest.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Pristine Rune-Etched Bone from Awakened Dead in Alpine Rise.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Pristine Rune-Etched Bone to Lucille Waycrest in Alpine Rise.
QuestData.RewardText: These markings... this is the language of the Drust!$B$BThe magic of the coven must be disturbing their spirits, drawing them back into our world to fight us once more!$B$BThis is unsettling... but it is another reason we must bring an end to the Heartsbane!
